intro: Welcome once again user to yet another choose your own adventure, now that you have completed your first story, I feel that you are ready to officially start your exciting adventure. You will be traversing through the dark forest, a dank and dangerous place. Known to be filled with dangerous traps and even more dangerous individuals. Will you make it out alive, or will you be one of the many victims of this evil place? We shall see indeed, but as always those who do not have the stomach for adventure are not fit for this quest.
